raw_body: PANAMBALANA LEONARD – (Retired Secretary – Ministry of Health). Cherished and treasured husband of Quinzie,​ precious Thaththa & Appachchi of Malkanthi & Lal,​ Chandi & Primal,​ Dushi & Manilal and adored Aththa & Thaththa of Cisholi,​ Chehani,​ Ashanya,​ Janek,​ Maneka,​ Dineeka,​ Mithraka & Dhruvik,​ beloved son of the late Sylvester & Josephine Panamlabalana,​ loved brother of late Harry,​ late Kingsley,​ Pauline,​ Alan & late Christo,​ loved uncle of Robert & Mohan,​ passedaway peacefully. Remains lie at 51,​ Asoka Circle,​ Subuthipura,​ Battaramulla from 4.00 p.m. Friday,​ 4th August 2023. Cortege leaves at 3.45 p.m. on Saturday,​ 5 August 2023 for Cremation at the General Cemetery Kanatte (New Crematorium) at 4.30 p.m.048116
